name: Gama Token
description: GAMA is the utility token of the GAMA Web3 gaming platform. Players earn GAMA tokens as rewards for winning games, while losing results in token burns, creating a deflationary supply. The total supply is capped to ensure scarcity, with allocations for community rewards, platform growth, and liquidity. GAMA powers a vibrant gaming economy, making it valuable for both gamers and crypto enthusiasts.
